name: isurl
description: Determines whether a value is a WHATWG URL.
author: Steven Vachon <contact@svachon.com> (https://www.svachon.com/)

scripts.ci: npm run test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.posttest: nyc report --reporter=html && browserify lib --global-transform [ babelify --presets [ @babel/env ] ] --standalone=isURL | terser --compress --mangle | gzip-size
